mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EQM( EQM_ID, EQM_NAME, MODEL_NO, VEND_ID, TEMP_MAX, TEMP_MIN, CHCK_PERD, REG_DT, MNGR, EQM_IMG, PURC_DT, FG, SPEC, USE_YN, UPH ) VALUES (#{eqmId},#{eqmName},#{modelNo},#{vendId},#{tempMax},#{tempMin},#{chckPerd},#{regDt},#{mngr},#{eqmImg},#{purcDt},#{fg},#{spec},#{useYn},#{uph})
mapper.select:
SELECT E.EQM_ID AS EQM_ID, E.EQM_NAME AS EQM_NAME, P.PRCS_ID AS PRCS_ID, P.NM AS NM, E.USE_YN AS USE_YN, E.FG AS FG, E.TEMP_MAX AS TEMP_MAX, E.TEMP_MIN AS TEMP_MIN, E.CHCK_PERD AS CHCK_PERD, E.EQM_IMG AS EQM_IMG FROM EQM E, PRCS P WHERE E.EQM_ID = P.EQM_ID
AND E.FG = F_COM_NM_TO_CODE(#{gubun})
SELECT E.*, P.PRCS_ID, P.NM FROM EQM E, PRCS P WHERE E.EQM_ID = P.EQM_ID AND E.EQM_ID = #{eqmId}
mapper.update: UPDATE EQM SET TEMP_MAX = #{tempMax}, TEMP_MIN = #{tempMin}, CHCK_PERD = #{chckPerd}, EQM_IMG = #{eqmImg}, USE_YN = #{useYn} WHERE EQM_ID = #{eqmId}
mapper.select:
SELECT E.EQM_ID AS EQM_ID, E.EQM_NAME AS EQM_NAME, E.CHCK_PERD AS CHCK_PERD, P.PRCS_ID AS PRCS_ID, P.NM AS NM FROM EQM E, PRCS P WHERE E.EQM_ID = P.EQM_ID
AND E.FG = F_COM_NM_TO_CODE(#{gubun})
SELECT A.*, E.EQM_NAME FROM ( SELECT O.*, R.RESN_NAME FROM EQM_NON_OPR O, EQM_NON_OPR_RESN R WHERE O.RESN_ID = R.RESN_ID AND EQM_ID = 'EQM-001' ) A, EQM E WHERE A.EQM_ID = E.EQM_ID
